title: Dietrich Mateschitz, Creator of the Red Bull Empire, Dies at 78
description: The Austrian salesman turned a Thai energy drink into a marketing juggernaut that owned sports teams, media outlets and a winning Formula 1 crew.
dc:creator: Christopher F. Schuetze
media:description: Dietrich Mateschitz was a salesman for a company that made personal hygiene products when he discovered the elixirs sold in Asian pharmacies as pick-me-ups for workers and truckers.
